data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Vehicle amenity selection (champagne, decorations)". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.
